Carnatron stopped. "Later commander, im going to check out this alarm." He ran 
off to the coordinates.
> ::Alarms can be heard in Hydras' base. Alarms sounding an intruder on 
> the outer perimeter. The cage trap is sending the signal as to the 
> coordinates.
> 
> Computer: ALERT! ALERT!
